mapper.select: SELECT max(cpu_total_pct) as cpu_pct, max(mem_use_pct) as mem_pct, max(disk_vol1_usage_pct) as disk_vol1_pct, to_char(date_trunc('hour', hhmmss), 'dd hh24') as hhmmss FROM tb_usage_system_1min where hhmmss >= now() - interval '1 day' GROUP BY date_trunc('hour', hhmmss) ORDER BY date_trunc('hour', hhmmss) asc;
